title: Bethesda Showcase, Quakecon Canceled - Kinda Funny Games Daily 04.01.20
description:
Gary Whitta and Greg talk about Bethesda, Quakecon, COVID, and more. 
 
Time Stamps -
 00:06:10 - Housekeeping
Persona 5 Royal Q&A Stream on Youtube.com/kindafunnygames
Troy Baker comes to We Have Cool Friends Friday!
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Mohammed Mohammed, Al Tribesman, Black Jack
The Roper Report   -
00:07:20 - No Bethesda Says No Showcase in June, No QuakeCon
00:22:50 - WWE Simming Matches, Superstars commentating, Gabe Gurwin @ GameSpot
00:26:30 - COVID Updates
00:36:36 - April Fools Updates
00:43:50 - Out today
00:47:17 -  Animal Crossing Mornings - Watch  Twitch.tv/GaryWhitta
 Reader mail   -
00:50:00 - Should Twitch be enforcing these timelines with the developers to help not let things leak early? Or is this one of those rare times because of how shitty the world is, that we should just let people chat about it, even people who are under embargo but are currently playing the game?  - The Nano Biologist
00:54:40 - Required Reading:
01:07:50 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts:Blessing and Tim
